section.p: To renounce the worship of Amanushi, you must pay 40 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation.
The priest begs you to reconsider. 'Do not forget that Amanushi can protect you from the knife in the dark, and the depredations of those who would steal from you.'

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 40 Shards and
delete Amanushi from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet.
